txt.en: 'Fine, fine! It's the teeth of Scatha you want to see, then? Oh, don't you worry, I know right where to find them. And you are lucky you found me. Those are in the old vaults. Hardly any dwarf knows the way back there, other than me! And if Fróthi sent you, I am happy to show them off. I would not mind taking a look at the old things, myself, now that I think of it.\n\n'I will return shortly. Please, drink some while you wait. No, no, I insist. In fact, I will be offended if you do not!'
Perhaps you should go check on Górsim
Górsim appears with a sack in hand

'And now what are you doing down here? This is all wrong, all of it. Do you see? This is the sack that held the necklace, and by Smaug's bones, it is empty but for a single tooth. \n\n'Oh, this is not good. You must go and tell Fróthi at once!'
You should talk to Górsim, who can be found down in the vaults in Erebor.
You should speak with the lore-master Fróthi, who can be found in Erebor.
'The necklace, stolen? That was a piece of our history, [placeholder]. This is a serious grievance!'
Górsim the vault-keeper agrees to help you find the necklace made from Scatha's teeth.
Górsim can be found at one of the older vaults in Erebor.
You should have a drink while you wait for Górsim, in Erebor.
